# ExtensionPointDefining

**Protocol**

An interface that extension point types adopt.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol ExtensionPointDefining
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ExtensionFoundation] framework uses this protocol to identify types that represent extension points.

## Extension-point management

- **AppExtensionPoint**: A type you use to declare your host app’s extension points and bind to them from app extensions.

## Conforming Types

- AppExtensionPoint
